name: 許書涵
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
schedule:
Week　　　　　　　　Topic (Sections)
1　　Introduction, Definitions, Units, Systems 
  　　Properties, State, Processes, Cycles 
2　　State postulate, Temperature 　　
  　　Pressure, Problem-Solving, Energy 
3　　Heat Transfer, Work 
4　　The First Law of Thermodynamics 
                   Energy Conversion Efficiencies
5　　Pure Substance, Phase-Change
6　　Property Diagrams　　
                  Thermodynamic Property Tables
7　　Moving Boundary Work　　 
                  Energy Balance for Closed Systems 
8　　Specific Heats　　 
                  Internal Energy, Enthalpy, Specific Heats for Ideal Gases 
9　　Midterm Exam
10. 　　Internal Energy, Enthalpy, Specific Heats of Solids and Liquids
11　　Mass Balance for Control Volumes 
 　　Flow Work and the Energy of a Flowing Fluid 
12　　Energy Balance for Steady-Flow Systems 
13.　　Some Steady-Flow Engineering Devices 
 　　Nozzles, Diffusers, Turbines, Compressors
14               Throttling valves, Mixing chambers, Heat exchangers, Pipe and duct flow 
15　　Unsteady-flow process　　
                   Introduction to the Second law, Thermal Reservoirs 
16　　Heat engines 　　
                  Refrigerators, Heat Pumps, Perpetual-Motion Machines 
                  Reversible & Irreversible Processes, Carnot cycle
17　　Carnot Principles, The Thermodynamic Temperature Scale　　　　
　　Carnot Heat Engine
                  Carnot Refrigerator and Heat Pump 
18 　　Final Exam
scorePolicy:
作業20%
小考20%
期中考30%
期末考30%
materials: Cengel, Yunus A., and Boles, Michael A., Thermodynamics An Engineering Approach, Ninth Edition, McGraw-Hill, 2019.
